items.title: National grid records fresh system collapse
items.summary: Electricity consumers across Lagos experienced outage after the national grid collapsed.

items.title: Kaduna Electric explains blackout in Sokoto
items.summary: The distribution company cites a transmission constraint causing power outage.

items.title: TCN restores national grid after maintenance
items.summary: Grid restoration completed following scheduled maintenance on the Lagos-Ibadan 330kV line.

items.title: Ikeja Electric announces planned outage for Ayobo feeder
items.summary: Planned electricity outage to upgrade Ayobo 11kV feeder infrastructure.

items.title: TCN commences emergency repairs on Benin transmission line
items.summary: Emergency maintenance to reduce power outage in Edo communities.

items.title: WAEC opens 2025 SSCE registration portal
items.summary: WAEC Nigeria has opened the SSCE registration and result checker portal for 2025 candidates.

items.title: JED announces feeder upgrade for Bukuru axis
items.summary: Upgrade work will improve power stability across the Bukuru distribution network.

items.title: How to check 2025 JAMB result without cyber cafe
items.summary: Guide explains the official UTME result checker process and SMS steps.

items.title: Nigeria signs deal to upgrade electricity transmission grid
items.summary: The agreement aims to improve power supply reliability and reduce outages.

items.title: DisCos unveil new plan to curb load shedding
items.summary: Distribution companies say investment will reduce power outages by 25 percent.

items.title: EKEDC schedules maintenance on Lekki transmission line
items.summary: Customers in Lekki will experience a 6-hour outage due to preventive maintenance.

items.title: Students seek clarity on WAEC result release date
items.summary: Education experts advise candidates to rely on official WAEC communications.

items.title: JAMB releases 2025 UTME result checker update
items.summary: The Joint Admissions and Matriculation Board has updated the UTME result checker process for 2025 candidates.

items.title: NECO urges candidates to secure result checker tokens
items.summary: Officials warn against patronising unofficial vendors.

items.title: NECO releases 2024 November/December results
items.summary: NECO has released the 2024 Nov/Dec SSCE results with guidance on result checker tokens.

items.title: Universities urge JAMB to extend UTME registration
items.summary: Calls grow for more time to complete UTME registration.

items.title: Kaduna Electric issues restoration timeline for Kakuri
items.summary: Repairs on the Kakuri 33kV feeder will conclude by 18:00hrs.

items.title: Ghana launches new examination reforms for WAEC
items.summary: Reforms include digital verification for regional exams.

items.title: WAEC introduces new SSCE verification cards
items.summary: The examination body says the cards will reduce exam malpractice.

items.title: Emergency load shedding advisory for North-West
items.summary: TCN announces emergency load shedding to protect transmission assets.

items.title: Experts fault prolonged power outage in Abuja
items.summary: Residents lament ongoing electricity outage in the capital city.

items.title: Important CAPS advisory for admission letters
items.summary: Candidates should log into CAPS to accept or reject admission offers.

items.title: Load shedding notice for Festac and Apapa
items.summary: Load shedding implemented to manage low allocation from the national grid.

items.title: WAEC clarifies e-PIN purchase procedure
items.summary: Parents and candidates are to purchase e-PINs only from accredited outlets.

items.title: Emergency outage alert for Rayfield and environs
items.summary: Faulty breaker isolated; restoration expected within 4 hours.

items.title: Power restoration update for Alimosho customers
items.summary: Supply restored after fault isolation on Alimosho 33kV line.

items.title: NECO announces e-Verify maintenance window
items.summary: Scheduled maintenance on the NECO e-Verify portal will occur this weekend.

items.title: Planned maintenance on Zaria City injection substation
items.summary: Customers should expect temporary outage between 09:00hrs and 14:00hrs.
